rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Acid Sewage, reappropriate or pay {3}. [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: [i]Under Ivenge, humanity created abundantly, each invention outpacing the last. Now, the remnants of those marvels are yet another hazard.[/i]
